程序包 com.teamone.unitask.tasks

类 TaskController

java.lang.Object
com.teamone.unitask.tasks.TaskController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000/", maxAge=3600L, allowCredentials="true") @RestController @RequestMapping(path="tasks") public class TaskController extends Object
The controller class for the task board page.

  • 方法详细资料

    • creatNewTask

      @PostMapping(path="/createTask", consumes="application/json;charset=UTF-8") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Task> creatNewTask(@RequestBody Task requestTask, @RequestParam(name="taskId") Long taskId, @RequestParam(name="projectTitle") String projectTitle, @RequestParam(name="username") String username)
      Create a new task.
      参数:
      requestTask - The task details to create.
      taskId - The ID of the parent task, if any.
      projectTitle - The title of the project to which the task belongs.
      username - The username of the user assigned to the task.
      返回:
      ResponseEntity with the created task or null if the request is invalid.

    • getAllTaskByProjectTitle

      @GetMapping(path="/getAllTask") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<List<Task>>> getAllTaskByProjectTitle(@RequestParam("projectTitle") String projectTitle)
      Get all the tasks in the given project.
      参数:
      projectTitle - The title of the project.
      返回:
      ResponseEntity with a list of tasks or null if the project is not found.

    • updateTask

      @PutMapping(path="/updateTask") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Task> updateTask(@RequestBody Task task, @RequestParam("taskId") Long taskId, @RequestParam("username") String username)
      Edit an existing task.
      参数:
      task - The updated task details.
      taskId - The ID of the task to update.
      username - The username of the user assigned to the task.
      返回:
      ResponseEntity with the updated task or null if the request is invalid.

    • deleteTaskById

      @DeleteMapping(path="/deleteTask") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Task> deleteTaskById(@RequestParam("taskId") Long taskId)
      Delete the given existing task.
      参数:
      taskId - The ID of the task to delete.
      返回:
      ResponseEntity with the deleted task or null if the task is not found.
